id: party that owns a business, has the rights to all profits from that business and is considered a single entity (unincorporated) together with that business for tax and liability purposes
name: party that owns a business, has the rights to all profits from that business and is considered a single entity (unincorporated) together with that business for tax and liability purposes

id: SoleProprietorships.rdf version of this ontology was modified to eliminate a redundant subclass relationship, enhance ownership relations, and revise definitions to be ISO 704 compliant.
name: SoleProprietorships.rdf version of this ontology was modified to eliminate a redundant subclass relationship, enhance ownership relations, and revise definitions to be ISO 704 compliant.

id: SoleProprietorships.rdf version of this ontology was modified to eliminate unnecessary references to external sources.
name: SoleProprietorships.rdf version of this ontology was modified to eliminate unnecessary references to external sources.

id: SoleProprietorships.rdf version of this ontology was modified to use natural person rather than legally capable person.
name: SoleProprietorships.rdf version of this ontology was modified to use natural person rather than legally capable person.

id: SoleProprietorships.rdf version of this ontology was modified per the FIBO 2.0 RFC.
name: SoleProprietorships.rdf version of this ontology was modified per the FIBO 2.0 RFC.

id: SoleProprietorships.rdf version of the ontology was modified to use the Commons Ontology Library (Commons) Annotation Vocabulary rather than the OMG's Specification Metadata vocabulary.
name: SoleProprietorships.rdf version of the ontology was modified to use the Commons Ontology Library (Commons) Annotation Vocabulary rather than the OMG's Specification Metadata vocabulary.

id: unincorporated business owned by a single person
name: unincorporated business owned by a single person

id: This ontology defines the fundamental concepts for representing sole proprietorships -- i.e., organizations that are owned by an individual that is responsible for the liabilities of the organization.
name: This ontology defines the fundamental concepts for representing sole proprietorships -- i.e., organizations that are owned by an individual that is responsible for the liabilities of the organization.

id: A sole proprietor has unlimited liability with respect to any business debts.
name: A sole proprietor has unlimited liability with respect to any business debts.

id: SoleProprietorships.rdf version of the ontology was modified to replace content that is now available in the OMG Commons Ontology Library (Commons) v1.1 (FND-380).
name: SoleProprietorships.rdf version of the ontology was modified to replace content that is now available in the OMG Commons Ontology Library (Commons) v1.1 (FND-380).

id: SoleProprietorships.rdf version of this ontology was modified to make sole proprietorship a subclass of legal person.
name: SoleProprietorships.rdf version of this ontology was modified to make sole proprietorship a subclass of legal person.
